organic_results.title: How teachers perceive the relation between school and society
organic_results.snippet: A SERIES OF studies of the school as a social institution was begun at the Institute of Sociological Research early in 1969. The studies are guided by two basic queries:(1) What is the nature of the relationship between the dynamics of society and of the school; in other words, how can a school system that generally tends toward rigidity adapt itself to the demands of a changing society?(2) How do differentiation and hierarchies related to schooling evolve in a society that is striving toward egalitarianism? These problems are …
